Chris’ Journey with Hyper

“The biggest challenge I faced before joining Hyper was navigating the complexities of launching a scalable business in the PCO driver space without a strong tech background. From creating an MVP to setting up operational infrastructure, it was difficult to know where to start.

Hyper helped me overcome this challenge by providing expert guidance on MVP scoping, assisting with the setup of engineering and support offices in Europe, and offering strategic advice that saved us both time and money.

One of the most valuable things I gained from Hyper was a clear technical strategy and a solid operational framework that allowed us to launch and grow Splend effectively. Thanks to Hyper’s guidance, I was able to launch Splend with confidence, deliver a seamless experience for PCO drivers, and build a sustainable business model tailored to their needs. Today, my startup is a market leader in providing PCO drivers with an affordable, stress-free way to own their vehicles, with smooth operations and a growing presence across multiple regions.”
